item.title: Blaze reduces 3,000 shops in Bangladesh to ashes
item.description: A fire at the cloth market in the Bangladeshi capital, Dhaka, has destroyed thousands of businesses, just weeks before Eid celebrations begin. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Dhaka, cloth market, Bangladesh, fire, urban safety, disaster, emergency,
item.media:title: Blaze reduces 3,000 shops in Bangladesh to ashes

item.title: Turkey: Baby and mother reunite after two months
item.description: Baby who was found under the rubble five days after the earthquake in Turkey, has finally reunited with her mother. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Turkey, earthquake, quake, disaster, mother, baby, family, reunion, survivor
item.media:title: Turkey: Baby and mother reunite after two months

item.title: Desexualizing the breasts
item.description: Lotte Mies is a gender equality activist from Berlin. She won a legal battle to allow women to be topless in the city’s public pools as of March 9. What do you think about this?
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, gender equality, activism, women's rights, public pools, Berlin, Germany, legal battle, body positivity, nudity
item.media:title: Desexualizing the breasts
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,gender equality, activism, women's rights, public pools, Berlin, Germany, legal battle, body positivity, nudity

item.title: Putin’s doppelganger supports Ukraine
item.description: Sławomir Sobala’s outward similarity to Vladimir Putin made him a much sought-after impersonator of the Russian president. But after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine he stopped playing in comedies and commercials. He is now looking for more critical productions.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Putin, Russia, impersonator, actor, comedy, entertainment
item.media:title: Putin’s doppelganger supports Ukraine
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Putin, Russia, impersonator, actor, comedy, entertainment

item.title: Germany: Easier immigration for skilled workers
item.description: Are you young, skilled and speak German? This could be your chance to come work in Germany. With the Chancenkarte, Germany plans to introduce a modern immigration law to attract more skilled workers. A draft law will be introduced in autumn.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Germany, immigration, policy, law, work, job opportunities, job market, professionals
item.media:title: Germany: Easier immigration for skilled workers
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Germany, immigration, policy, law, work, job opportunities, job market, professionals

item.title: A drone to protect paradise
item.description: This drone is protecting the Maldives – by killing off one of its inhabitants: The hairy caterpillar. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Maldives, drone, insect, technology, disinfestation, pest control
item.media:title: A drone to protect paradise
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Maldives, drone, insect, technology, disinfestation, pest control

item.title: How to stop the public from smoking
item.description: Indonesia is banning the sale of single cigarettes, in a bid to reduce access to tobacco products. @DW

item.media:title: How to stop the public from smoking

item.title: Is wood burning a green source of energy?
item.description: 60% of the EU's "renewable" energy comes from wood and other biomass.

item.title: Inside Bangladesh's "Death Squad"
item.description: Bangladesh's elite police unit RAB has long been accused of murder, torture and abductions. The government has always rejected these claims. Now, for the first time, DW and NetraNews spoke to two whistleblowers from inside the "death squad”.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Bangladesh, RAB, investigative, death squad, elite police
item.media:title: Inside Bangladesh's "Death Squad"
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Bangladesh, RAB, investigative, death squad, elite police
